metadata.title: CVE-2017-15019 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: LAME 3.99.5 has a NULL Pointer Dereference in the hip_decode_init function within libmp3lame/mpglib_interface.c via a malformed mpg file, because of an incorrect calloc call.

criterions.comment: lame package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.100-2').
